db:info.db:title: EnterKeyAction QML Type
db:info.db:edition: Qt Virtual Keyboard | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Provides attached properties for customizing the enter key.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The EnterKeyAction type provides attached properties which allows customizing the enter key button of the keyboard.
The EnterKeyAction must be used directly inside the item receiving input focus, e.g. TextInput.

db:section.db:title: EnterKeyAction.actionId : int
db:section.db:para: Sets the action id for the enter key in virtual keyboard. When the action id is set, it takes preference over the label and sets the icon for the enter key.

db:listitem.db:para: EnterKeyAction.Go Action performs go operation. For example taking user to the entered url.
EnterKeyAction.Send Action sends the entered text.
EnterKeyAction.Next Action moves the input focus to the next field accepting text input.
EnterKeyAction.Done Same as EnterKeyAction.Next, except all the text input is done.

db:section.db:title: EnterKeyAction.enabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Enables or disables the enter key button in virtual keyboard.

db:section.db:title: EnterKeyAction.label : string
db:section.db:para: Sets the label for the enter key in virtual keyboard.
